Upon Reinspection

a project with a background image

Watercolour and ink on paper 18″ × 24″



I'm looking for moments when there is little distinction between nature and humanity, when we cannot tell where one ends and the other begins. Perhaps we can learn about, and care about the world by realizing in little moments that we are all one.
